foreignData.name: Blubberschlinge
foreignData.text:
Bonus {2}{U} (Du kannst zusätzlich {2}{U} bezahlen, sowie du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst.)
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Wenn die Blubberschlinge ins Spiel kommt und falls ihre Bonuskosten bezahlt wurden, tappe die verzauberte Kreatur.
Die verzauberte Kreatur enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.

foreignData.name: Trampa de burbujas
foreignData.text:
Estímulo {2}{U}. (Puedes pagar {2}{U} adicionales al lanzar este hechizo.)
Encantar criatura.
Cuando la Trampa de burbujas entre al campo de batalla, si fue estimulada, gira la criatura encantada.
La criatura encantada no se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreignData.name: Collet à bulles
foreignData.text:
Kick {2}{U} (Vous pouvez payer {2}{U} supplémentaires au moment où vous lancez ce sort.)
Enchanter : créature
Quand le Collet à bulles arrive sur le champ de bataille, s'il a été kické, engagez la créature enchantée.
La créature enchantée ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.

foreignData.name: Trappola di Bolle
foreignData.text:
Potenziamento {2}{U} (Puoi pagare {2}{U} addizionale mentre lanci questa magia.)
Incanta creatura
Quando la Trappola di Bolle entra nel campo di battaglia, se è stata potenziata, TAPpa la creatura incantata.
La creatura incantata non STAPpa durante lo STAP del suo controllore.

foreignData.name: 泡の罠
foreignData.text:
キッカー{2}{U}（あなたはこの呪文を唱えるに際し、追加で{2}{U}を支払ってもよい。）
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
泡の罠が戦場に出たとき、これがキッカーされていた場合、エンチャントしているクリーチャーをタップする。
エンチャントしているクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: 거품 올가미
foreignData.text:
키커 {2}{U} (당신은 이 주문을 발동하면서 추가로 {2}{U}를 지불할 수 있다.)
생물에게 부여
거품 올가미가 전장에 들어올 때, 거품 올가미의 키커 비용이 지불되었다면, 부여된 생물을 탭한다.
부여된 생물은 조종자의 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.

foreignData.name: Armadilha de Bolhas
foreignData.text:
Reforçar {2}{U} (Você pode pagar um custo adicional de {2}{U} conforme conjura esta mágica.)
Encantar criatura
Quando Armadilha de Bolhas entra no campo de batalha, se ela tiver sido reforçada, vire a criatura encantada.
A criatura encantada não desvira durante a etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.

foreignData.name: Силки из Пузырей
foreignData.text:
Усилитель {2}{U} (При разыгрывании этого заклинания вы можете дополнительно заплатить {2}{U}.)
Зачаровать существо
Когда Силки из Пузырей выходят на поле битвы, если они получили Усилитель, поверните зачарованное существо.
Зачарованное существо не разворачивается во время шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.

foreignData.name: 水泡圈套
foreignData.text:
增幅{2}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{U}。）
结附于生物
当水泡圈套进战场时，若它已增幅，则横置所结附的生物。
所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

foreignData.name: 水泡圈套
foreignData.text:
增幅{2}{U}（你施放此咒語時可以額外支付{2}{U}。）
結附於生物
當水泡圈套進戰場時，若它已增幅，則橫置所結附的生物。
所結附的生物於其操控者的重置步驟中不能重置。

name: Bubble Snare
originalText:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Enchant creature
When Bubble Snare enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

rulings.text: Kicker represents an optional additional cost that you may choose to pay as you cast the spell. A spell cast with that additional cost paid is “kicked.”
You can’t pay a kicker cost more than once.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can’t kick it.

If you copy a kicked spell, the copy is also kicked. If a card or token enters the battlefield as a copy of a permanent that’s already on the battlefield, the new permanent isn’t kicked, even if the original was.

To determine a spell’s total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card’s effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.

Some instant or sorcery spells require alternative or additional targets if they’re kicked. You ignore these targeting requirements if those spells aren’t kicked, and you can’t kick those spells unless you can choose the appropriate targets. On the other hand, you can kick a permanent spell even if you won’t be able to choose targets for an enters-the-battlefield ability of that permanent once the spell resolves.

An ability that triggers when a player casts a kicked spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger, but after targets have been chosen for that spell. It resolves even if that spell is countered.

text:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Enchant creature
When Bubble Snare enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
